name: FriendlyVirus
description:
Explore the Lockdown times with an adventure!

Start your Finger Fight adventure now! Be ready to fight the virus and show your skills in a game out there.

Game:

● DONT LET VIRUS GET YOU. Fight the adventure by going through the very same place you would have gone very causally.

● MULTI-STAGE LEVELS. Play fun, challenging levels with multiple obstacles and multiple opportunities.  

[How to play] :

+ Tap to Jump while skidding through safe soap bars.

+ Avoid Hitting Virus, Police and Human if you have been hit by Virus already.

+ Collect Mask for not spreading the virus around.
